backend/main.mo: Defines actor with user, booking, tailor, and address types plus maps for persistent storage and authorization-protected profile and booking queries and mutations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature‑to‑file mappings, related components, and confidence levels for implemented app features including auth, bookings, and dashboards.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for major frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining global OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens with shared border and background styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx as the entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component implementing hash‑based routing, authentication checks, role‑based access control, and conditional rendering of core pages.
frontend/src/components/addresses/SavedA: Dialog component for listing, selecting, adding, and deleting saved addresses using React Query mutations and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays and manages bookings, including filtering, assigning tailors, and setting estimated prices.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTailo: Lists tailors and allows admins to activate or deactivate their profiles.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Shows all registered users with their profile details and principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access‑denied message with a button redirecting to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout and updates query state accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to enter name and choose a role before saving their profile.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Provides UI for selecting and confirming valid booking status transitions.
Displays a chronological log of booking status changes with timestamps.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders a responsive header with role‑based navigation links and login controls.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays booking payment info, allows admins to set price, and updates payment status via mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile and admin status using the actor, handling loading and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, bookings, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with stats and tabs for managing bookings, tailors, and users.
frontend/src/pages/booking/BookingDetail: Displays detailed booking info with status, history, tailor data, and actions for customers, tailors, and admins.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerBook: Shows a customer's bookings and provides a form to create new tailoring appointments.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/LandingSect: Marketing landing section with hero content, features, and a call‑to‑action for customers and tailors.
frontend/src/pages/tailor/TailorDashboar: Tailor dashboard for managing profiles and handling incoming and active booking requests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session‑based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with theme extensions, colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, image requirements, and a list of implemented features for the StichMe tailoring app. It outlines backend/frontend expectations and tracks feature versions and requirements.
